holographic_hmd: Windows 混合现实头戴式显示器
SourceInputMode_StickyDpad: 激活后保持十字键操作
SourceInputMode_button_tooltip: Use this control like a Button. Handles touches, clicks, holds, double clicks, and long presses.
SourceInputMode_trackpad_tooltip: Use this control like a Trackpad. XY positioning, touches, and presses.
SourceInputMode_joystick_tooltip: Use this control like a Joystick. XY positioning, touches, and presses.
SourceInputMode_toggle_button_tooltip: Use this control like a toggle. One press for on, one press for off.
SourceInputMode_dpad_click_tooltip: Use this control like a DPAD being clicked. Clicks in North, East, South, and West quadrants.
SourceInputMode_dpad_touch_tooltip: Use this control like a DPAD being touched. North, East, South, and West quadrants.
SourceInputMode_dpad_tooltip: Use this control like a DPAD being clicked or touched. Split up in North, East, South, and West quadrants.
SourceInputMode_scroll_tooltip: Use this control as a scroll wheel. Reports horizontal and vertical scrolling amounts.
SourceInputMode_Force_Sensor_tooltip: Gives analog actions a 0-1 value indicating how much force the user is applying to the control.
SourceInputMode_trigger_tooltip: Use this control as if it was a trigger. Touch (or any press), Click if there is a physical click at the end of the trigger, and the amount (0-1) the trigger is depressed.
SourceInputMode_Grab_tooltip: Combines capacitive sensors and force sensors to report a more reliable grab.
SourceInputMode_Scalar_Constant_tooltip: Allows you to use a digital (on/off) control to set an analog (0-1) value.
SourceInputMode_Click_tooltip: For controls that are physical buttons this engages on press down. Otherwise engages when a configurable threshold has been passed.
SourceInputMode_TriggerClick_tooltip: The physical click at the end of a trigger.
SourceInputMode_Touch_tooltip: True when the control is being touched.
SourceInputMode_Held_tooltip: True while the button is down before the amount of time specified in Long Press Delay has passed.
SourceInputMode_Single_tooltip: For controls that are physical buttons this engages on press down. Otherwise engages when a configurable threshold has been passed.
SourceInputMode_Double_tooltip: True after a double click has been executed (down / up and down / up again)
SourceInputMode_Long_tooltip: True when a click has been engaged for the configured amount of seconds.
SourceInputMode_North_tooltip: The North or top section of the control.
SourceInputMode_South_tooltip: The South or bottom section of the control.
SourceInputMode_East_tooltip: The East or right section of the control.
SourceInputMode_West_tooltip: The West or left section of the control.
SourceInputMode_Position_tooltip: The position you are touching on a touchpad or the position you've pushed a joystick to.
SourceInputMode_Pull_tooltip: A value (0-1) representing what percentage you have depressed a trigger.
SourceInputMode_Force_tooltip: The amount of force (0-1) applied to the control.
SourceInputMode_Proximity_tooltip: True when the control is close to something.
SourceInputMode_ClickActivateThreshold_t: The threshold that must be passed for the click to be true.
SourceInputMode_TouchActivateThreshold_t: The threshold that must be passed for the touch to be true.
SourceInputMode_ClickDeactivateThreshold: The threshold that the value must fall under for the click to be false.
SourceInputMode_TouchDeactivateThreshold: The threshold that the value must fall under for the touch to be false.
SourceInputMode_OverlapPercent_tooltip: The percentage of side to side overlap that the NESW zones will have.
SourceInputMode_DeadzonePercent_tooltip: The percentage from the center that the stick will need to pass to engage.
SourceInputMode_StickyDpad_tooltip: If you engage one zone then you can not accidentally engage another zone until you have disengaged. (ex. pushing stick North will engage North but if you then push the stick West it will remain engaging North until you release)
SourceInputMode_LongPressDelay_tooltip: The amount of time the button must be down before the long click is engaged.
SourceInputMode_DoublePressDelay_tooltip: The maximum amount of time between the end of the first click and the start of the second.
SourceInputMode_DeadZone_tooltip: The percentage from the center that the zones will need to pass to trigger.
SourceInputMode_StickyClick_tooltip: Keep thumbstick clicked while stick is deflected
SourceInputMode_StickyClick_Activate_too: How much you have to deflect the stick to engage.
SourceInputMode_StickyClick_Deactivate_t: How much you have to relax the stick for it to disengage.
SourceInputMode_ButtonModeInputForce_Cli: Optionally get the value for this from the force sensor (how much pressure is applied) or the capacitive sensor (how close a finger is).
SourceInputMode_CapsenseEnableThreshold_: At what point to enable the grab due to a finger being close to the grip.
SourceInputMode_GrabThreshold_tooltip: The combined activation thresholds for the capacitive sensor and the force sensor.
SourceInputMode_ReleaseThreshold_tooltip: The combined deactivation thresholds for the capacitive sensor and the force sensor.
SourceInputMode_ForceHoldThreshold_toolt: The level of pressure that must be applied to activate the action. (capsense usually happens first)
SourceInputMode_ForceReleaseThreshold_to: The level of pressure you must release to deactivate the action.
SourceInputMode_DowngradeSpeed_tooltip: The maximum speed (m/s) your controller can be moving at to maintain a grab after you had passed the force grab threshold but now are only passing the capsense threshold.
SourceInputMode_DropSpeed_tooltip: The minimum speed (m/s) your controller can be moving to force a drop when you have released pressure but haven't passed the cap sense deactivation threshold.
SourceInputMode_ScalarValue_tooltip: Sets a analog action based on a boolean value. (ex. Sets a trigger pull to 1 when the A button is pressed)
SourceInputMode_ScalarOnX_tooltip: The analog X value to set when this control is engaged. (ex. button down)
SourceInputMode_ScalarOffX_tooltip: The analog X value to set when this control is disengaged. (ex. button up)
SourceInputMode_ScalarOnY_tooltip: The analog Y value to set when this control is engaged. (ex. button down)
SourceInputMode_ScalarOffY_tooltip: The analog Y value to set when this control is disengaged. (ex. button up)
SourceInputMode_ScalarOnZ_tooltip: The analog Z value to set when this control is engaged. (ex. button down)
SourceInputMode_ScalarOffZ_tooltip: The analog Z value to set when this control is disengaged. (ex. button up)
SourceInputMode_HapticAmplitude_tooltip: How strong the haptic will be.
SourceInputMode_HapticDuration_tooltip: How long the haptic will last.
SourceInputMode_HapticFrequency_tooltip: How often the haptic will hit during the duration.
SourceInputMode_ScrollMode_tooltip: The type of scroll you'd like to use (trackpad or mouse wheel)
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_TrackpadAsp: The aspect ratio that you want the usable surface of the trackpad to be in. (w/h)
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_Multiplier_: How much each movement will scroll.
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_Acceleratio: How fast the scrolling will increase in speed
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_NotchesPerT: How many times should the haptic fire when sliding your finger over the length of the touchpad.
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_StartDistan: The minimum amount you need to scroll for a value to be reported.
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_MinThrowVel: The minimum velocity you can flick the touchpad.
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_MaxScrollVe: The max speed that the control can scroll.
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_Deceleratio: How fast the scrolling will decrease in speed.
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_MinLastVelo: How many previous velocities are needed to average speed.
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_MaxLastVelo: The maximum number of previous velocities to take into account for speed.
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_ThrownTermi: The maximum speed a flick can have.
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_EdgeScrollT: How close to the edge will engage 'edge scrolling'
How much to bias the vertical edge.
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_EdgeMinSwip: The minimum amount you can scroll to engage edge scrolling mode.
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_MinSideScro: The minimum ratio of side to side movement needed to engage a horizontal scroll.
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_Joystick_Mi: The minimum amount of change in the control to start scrolling.
SourceInputMode_DiscreteScroll_Trackpad_: How much each tick will scroll.
Get a haptic pulse on finger contact.
Locks scrolling direction to overall movement (ex. stops a backwards scroll when flicking).
Distance required before first scroll tick.
Distance required for subsequent scroll ticks.
Distance required to reverse scroll direction.
Direct manipulation sensitivity of the first scroll tick.
Direct manipulation sensitivity of the subsequent ticks.
Direct manipulation sensitivity when reversing a scroll.
Turn on or off scroll flicks.
The minimum distance for a flick to be recognized.
The power of flick generated scrolls.
The speed at which flicks slow down.
Enable continuous scrolling after sliding to edges and holding.
The power of each held scroll tick.
How fast a held scroll will tick.
The area of the trackpad at the top that scroll holds will engage.
The area of the trackpad at the bottom that scroll holds will engage.
Generate haptic pulses for held scroll ticks.
SourceInputMode_DiscreteScroll_Joystick_: How much to scroll each increment.
The side to side percentage that the stick will not scroll.
The top to bottom percentage that the stick will not scroll.
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_NotchesPerT: 各触控板高度的触感凹槽：
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_MinLastVelo: 计算平均速度所需最少先前速度：
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_MaxLastVelo: 计算平均速度所需最多先前速度：
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_EdgeScrollT: 边缘滚动临界值垂直偏差：
SourceInputMode_SmoothScroll_EdgeMinSwip: 边缘滚动所需最少滑动：
SourceInputMode_DiscreteScroll_Trackpad_: 滚动比例：
触摸触感：
反向抑制已启用：
触摸灵敏度：
滑动灵敏度：
反向灵敏度：
开始临界值：
移动临界值：
反向临界值：
轻扫滚动已启动用：
轻扫临界值：
轻扫滚动乘数：
轻扫动量：
滑动并保持滚动：
S&H 乘数：
S&H 脉冲率：
S&H 上边框：
滑动与保持下边框：
滑动与保持触感：
SourceInputMode_StickyClick: 倾斜时保持按压住摇杆
SourceInputMode_CapsenseEnableThreshold: 电容式感应启用临界值：
BindingUI_Save_Personal: 将此按键设置保存至您的个人列表。
BindingUI_Save_Public: 与其他用户共享此按键设置。
BindingUI_Save_Export: 将按键设置保存至 documents/steamvr/input/exports
BindingUI_Save_ReplaceDefault: 将按键设置保存为此应用的默认设置
BindingUI_Save_AddNewDefault: 在操作清单文件中添加此控制器类型。
BindingUI_List_MinutesPlayedThisMonth: 在过去 30 天内游玩了 %1$s 分钟
BindingUI_Mode_Delete_Confirm: 从 %2$s 中删除 %1$s 模式？
BindingUI_SaveDefaultName: 我为 %2$s 进行的 %1$s 配置
BindingUI_SaveDefaultName_Personal: 为 %2$s 保存的 %1$s 配置
BindingUI_List_OldVersionWarning: 这些按键设置是用较旧版本的 %1$s 制作的，需要更新。
BindingUI_List_OldVersionWarning_Current: 这些按键设置是用较旧版本的 %1$s 制作的，也许未包含所有必须操作。
SaveError_BindingWriteFailed: 写入按键设置文件失败。文件有写保护吗？
SaveError_ActionManifestWriteFailed: 写入操作清单文件失败。文件有写保护的吗？
AppSelect_Title: 选择要编辑的应用程序
BindingUI_List_Delete_Confirm: 要永久删除按键设置 %1$s 吗？
BindingUI_List_Select_Confirm: 您未保存对当前按键设置的更改。在使用此设置前，您是否要放弃这些更改或将其保存为个人设置？
BindingUI_List_Select_Confirm_Convert: 您当前的按键设置有未保存的更改。更新此按键设置将放弃这些更改，或者您可以在更新前将其保存为个人设置？
BindingUI_List_Upgrade_Confirm: 此按键设置来自之前的 %1$s 版本。您也许需要绑定额外操作，以便使其正常运作。
BindingUI_List_Developer_Binding_Descrip: 这些是此游戏开发者发布的官方按键设置。
BindingUI_List_Legacy_Binding_Descriptio: 这些是此游戏的默认按键设置。
PreservedAutosaveName: 升级前保存的本地变更
BindingUI_SteamVRUnavailable: 请运行 SteamVR 以继续使用按键设置界面
BindingUI_ErrorLoadingBindingTitle: 按键设置文件加载失败
input_binding_load_failed: 无法加载 %1$s 的输入设置。请选择另一个按键设置选项。
input_binding_load_failed_no_url: 未设置 %1$s 的 %2$s 按键设置。请从列表中选择一个按键设置选项或创建一个新按键设置。
input_binding_load_below_minimum_version: %1$s 的 %2$s 按键设置来自较旧版本的 %1$s。您的按键设置已经重置为默认。
InputDebugger_NoActiveActionSets: Application has no active action sets
ActionManifestError_ManifestParseError: %1$s 的操作清单存在一个问题：“%2$s”。
ActionManifestError_FileNotFound: 未找到 %1$s 的操作清单。
ActionManifestError_JSONParseError: %1$s 的操作清单不包含有效的 JSON。
DisplaySettings_ColumnCorrectionDesc: 列更正可以在移动头部时减少垂直“纱窗效应”。大部分用户应保持启用，并微调为 0。
DisplaySettings_Error_FirmwareUpdateNeed: 需要固件更新以启用显示器设置自定义。
SecondaryController_ReturnWithHead: 返回头戴式显示器按键设置
Settings_General_NotEnoughSamples: 请至少再按压摇杆 %1$s 下以完成校准。
Settings_General_InviteMoreSamples: 计算出的角度为 %1$s 度。保持按压以调整该值，或按下“确认”以接受此校准。
LegacyDebugger_NoApp: 运行任何旧版输入应用程序，以在此处查看其输入数据。
